meanings.definition: To have a tendency or preference towards something
meanings.sent1: I incline towards reading mystery novels in my free time.
meanings.sent2: She tends to incline towards a more relaxed approach to life.

meanings.sent5: As I grow older, I find myself inclining towards healthier food choices.
